name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dedicated Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive software development experience in healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **C/C++**, and skilled in debugging, scripting, and source control practices. I possess strong analytical skills and am committed to continuous integration and development lifecycles, ensuring high-quality software delivery. Known for exceptional problem-solving abilities and customer orientation, I excel in team collaboration and clear technical documentation.

My technical expertise extends to full-stack development leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Furthermore, my solid background in **cloud technologies** including **Azure** and **AWS** enhances my capability in constructing scalable solutions. I have significant experience implementing microservices architecture and event-driven systems, as well as proficiency in CI/CD automation to streamline deployment processes. Recently, I’ve engaged in developing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, aligning my projects with industry compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

Engaged in rigorous **debugging** practices to identify and resolve issues in software applications, enhancing stability and user experience.
Adapted to multiple programming environments and established **source control** protocols to manage codebases effectively, ensuring version consistency.
Facilitated thorough knowledge sharing by providing support in **English** and **German**, enhancing team understanding and collaboration in multinational settings.

Demonstrated strong **Software Development** skills by leading the development and modernization of financial platforms using a microservices-based architecture with **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and maintainability for high-volume transaction systems.
Exhibited exceptional **Analytical Skills** while building dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, leveraging **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** for responsive financial dashboards and admin portals.

Created automated ML pipelines for credit scoring and churn prediction with **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating real-time model inference into backend services with a focus on enhancing decision-making efficiency.

Utilized **C/C++** and **Assembler** for software development, ensuring adherence to the development lifecycle and excellence in coding standards.

Collaborated effectively within a team environment, fostering a culture of customer orientation and problem-solving to address challenges proactively.
Demonstrated proficiency in **English** and **German** to communicate technical concepts to diverse audiences and ensure clarity in project deliverables.
